client

Class ReiseClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.ReiseClient

  • public class ReiseClient
extends java.lang.Object
    ReiseClient Represents the Client who want to book something at the ReiseServer.
    Author:
    erik

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean abmelden()
      Sends a String to the connected ReiseServer which commands to close the connected socket.
      boolean buchen(java.lang.String reiseziel, java.lang.String[] teilnehmer)
      Contains the client part of the booking protocol written for the communication with the ReiseServer.

      1: client writes that it want to book something.
      2: client specifies what it wants to book an tells the travel destination "reiseziel" and the amount of needed places teilnehmer.
      3: If the Server responds are ok the method goes on and sends the names of the people who wnat to travel.
      4: the method returns true if the ReiseServer responds positve.
      int getFreiePlaetze(java.lang.String reiseziel)
      This method returns the exact amount of places that are still free for the by reiseziel identified journey.
      java.lang.String[] getReiseziel()

    • Method Detail

      • abmelden

        public boolean abmelden()
        Sends a String to the connected ReiseServer which commands to close the connected socket.
        Returns:
        a boolean that represents the success of the method: if true = method successful if false = method failed.

      • buchen

        public boolean buchen(java.lang.String reiseziel,
             java.lang.String[] teilnehmer)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Contains the client part of the booking protocol written for the communication with the ReiseServer.

        1: client writes that it want to book something.
        2: client specifies what it wants to book an tells the travel destination "reiseziel" and the amount of needed places teilnehmer.
        3: If the Server responds are ok the method goes on and sends the names of the people who wnat to travel.
        4: the method returns true if the ReiseServer responds positve.
        Parameters:
        reiseziel - a String that is used to lookup the Reise object
        teilnehmer - a Sting[] that contains the names of the people who want to book the journey specified by reiseziel
        Returns:
        a boolean that represents the success of the method: if true = method successful if false = method failed
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getFreiePlaetze

        public int getFreiePlaetze(java.lang.String reiseziel)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        This method returns the exact amount of places that are still free for the by reiseziel identified journey.
        Parameters:
        reiseziel - With the travel destination String it is possible to search for the searched journey.
        Returns:
        An Integer that tells the number of free places in the Reise Object.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getReiseziel

        public java.lang.String[] getReiseziel()
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Returns all travel destinations known by the ReiseServer. String by String it gets the travel destinations and converts them into a String[]
        Returns:
        a String[] that includes all travel destinations known by the ReiseServer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • verbinden

        public boolean verbinden(java.lang.String server,
                int port)
        Is called to establish a connection with a Server
        Parameters:
        server - a string that represents the web address of the server verbinden tries to connect with.
        port - a integer that represents the port on the server verbinden tries to connect with.
        Returns:
        a boolean that informs about the success of the connection attempt
        See Also:
        ReiseServer
